Posts.Content: Hi all  Having penultimate RT session (of 15) today after lumpectomy then partial reduction Been using r1 and r2 religiously Breast bit red and small blister on scar under breast but r1 has definitely helped Am working from home during treatment so lie on bed topless with r1 on as soon as get back and it cools the skin down straight away Starting to get a bit tired now but no other issues Looking forward to ringing figurative bell on Friday  Hope everyone else gets to the end ok too  Xxx

Posts.Content: I had a breast reduction of my left breast (as I didn't get clear margins on a lumpectomy) about 12 weeks ago.   I have been wearing crop tops but am quite conscious that I now have different sized breasts (my right breast is a 36FF and my reduced left breast is probably 36C) and without proper support, the right breast is quite a bit lower than the left one. I understand that I will be eligible for a reduction of my right breast in 6-12 months' time but would like to find a temporary solution in the meanwhile so would be very grateful if anyone else could recommend the best way to "even them up".
